# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when placing an entity next to another entity
- Ensure that there is enough space to place the entity with the specified spacing and direction. Check for existing entities that might be blocking the placement.

### Errors when getting an entity at a specific position
- Ensure that an entity of the specified type exists at the given position before attempting to retrieve it.

### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Check the inventory capacity of the target entity before attempting to insert items. Avoid inserting more items than the inventory can hold.

# NAMESPACE
- No new utility functions have been defined.
- Important variables:
  - No important variables have been assigned.
